title: Colbert Report logo id
content:
Please id this font.  
Thanks,  
Mara
author: mkstudio

comments.content:
Hi Mara,

that is [Times](http://web.archive.org/web/20150306061216/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/Times%20New%20Roman) Bold, except for the ‘C’ (which is rather from a [Baskerville](http://web.archive.org/web/20150306061216/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/Baskerville) or [Caslon](http://web.archive.org/web/20150306061216/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/Caslon) or the like).  
F
